item.title: By: Intro to Linux registration opens, Open Hardware Summit seeking submissions, and more | querkaer
item.dc:creator: Intro to Linux registration opens, Open Hardware Summit seeking submissions, and more | querkaer
item.description: […] The OSH is holding its fifth annual summit, September 30 – October 1 in Rome, and this year it’s open to the public. The theme is “from open making to open manufacturing,” and they’re looking for submissions. A list of suggested topics is available on the site. […]
